Name: Customer Export Sugar Prix
Expression: {TM1SubsetToSet([SLS_CUSTOMER] , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Indexed Customer]) = "" , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer IC]) = "" , "MDX_Sales_Group_level0" , "Customer IC") , IIF([zSELECT].(STRTOMEMBER(("[}Clients].[" + USERNAME) + "]"),[zSELECT_IND].[Customer IC]) = "" , "Indexed Customer only" , "Indexed Customer IC")))}
